name: A Song of Fire & Water
description:
A Song of Fire and Water

This game was developed in 7 days during the Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1

Together We're Stronger

You play as the sad and lonely Mr Bomb who has anger problems and is about to explode! To prevent this from happening you'll need to find your dear friend Mr Cool (the water guy). 

But the journey will not be easy, between you and Mr Cool there are many bullies (fire guys) who love to see you explode and if you let them get to you, they will pour their fire onto you.

You can move the blocks found everywhere in the level to block their path and slow them down, but be careful, they can destroy the blocks.

Good luck.

Controls
  • Move with WASD/ARROW-keys.
  • SPACE/E:  pick up & drop boxes | R: Restart level
  • You can also use controller
Credits
  • Character design, 2D/3D art & animations by Giorgio#6728 (Itch.io)
  • Programming and level design by Saeed Prez
